Blockchain.description:
My Parents hid My Box in millions of Moon bean blocks 
,I forgot tho, was it **308328**, **378239** or **299802**.
B-b-but I'm sure they said something about being the most expensive block on the **moon**.

Flag = HACKLABS{ParentsHash}

Author : Sanada#7802
hints: **Moon**nya ga cuma satu nih kayaknya, ayo pilih bulan yang benar! psst, "markas bulan. scan bulan .io "
Blockchain.name: Parents Love

Blockchain.description:
I wasn't expected anyone, and I mean ANYONE to find my secret.
I don't think you too will find it this time. Because it's deep, deep
7544066 moon bean below the surface.

Contract Address : `0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dEaD`

Flag = HACKLABS{Network_Token-on-that-day}

Author : Sanada#7802

Note: remove the "," in the token-on-that-day   
      ex: 13,37133713371337 -> 1337133713371337
hints: I created this challenge on the Ethereum Network - it is vast.
Blockchain.name: Deeper Into the Network

Blockchain.description:
I don't know what to tell you about space, It's such beautiful and immense. The food there.... hm.. well It's alike here, kintan, YES! KINTAN! You need to try that out there, Oh and I heard, they increase the Space Artifact Security since the last breach.
Good luck on your trip.

Note: - Flag Format + Rule included.   
**WARNING : DON'T DEPLOY THE CONTRACT ON SMART CHAIN NETWORK, JUST DON'T!!!**

`Author: Sanada#7802`
hints: Always double check for any possible encoding guys :)
Blockchain.name: International Space Station

Blockchain.description:

Forensic.name: ppppnnnngggg

Forensic.description:
Stefan has just currently developed a new ways of hiding a message inside an image. This one's known as **Stefanography** instead of **Steganography**.

Can you extract the original message from the image given?
He also attached his secret script to do it all.

`Author: aseng#2055`
Forensic.name: Stefanography

Forensic.description:
I receive this message from police department, which is not cool. It says that 5 days ago I've been caught in some form of fraud and stating that I've gone against the rules. I didn't know what i've just done but one thing for sure is i obey the rules of rambu lalu lintas. Here, I give you this attachment. ```[?]``` Can you find me the ``person's email`` who wrote all these things? P.S. : "What I know this far is that the person used an **online** service/website to send this message, which is the reason why I think this message is spoofed and not from real FBI Policeman." Wrap the flag in : ``hacklabs{...}``
Flag example : ``hacklabs{steve@org.id}`` ``Author: ByteBites#9671``
hints:
What goes through your mind when you see the filename? 
Is there anything unknown or making you confused?
Maybe the file's ``3x73n510n``?
Forensic.name: Spoofed

Forensic.description:
The author's friend sneaked to his office desk and played a little with his computer. He's so **sus** tho so the author wants to know what was his friend doing in his computer..., any kind of **typing** indications? .

P.S : The flag prefix is not usual, replace them with `hacklabs` later!

`Author: aseng#2055`
Forensic.name: Remote Sus

Forensic.description:
My brother's app is crashed but his Art assignment's deadline is 15 more minutes. Are you able to recover what was he writing before in his Ms. Paint application?

Download the file  [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TvbfM1mVagYSD0WgCvyO3VobQmnkZYvx/view?usp=share_link)

The flag's is insensitive so feel free to submit the flag if you got the right writing's and don't forget, it starts with `hacklabs{.*}`

Author: aseng#2055
hints: Some tools can find an exact image of what happen during the crash at certain **offset**. That's why this is a raw dump that its image can be recovered in an 8 bit style and customizable size.
Forensic.name: Child's Play

Forensic.description:
My friend created a secure password for my Windows Logon but I don't think there's any in the WinRAR files that he gave me earlier.  Can you find it for me? :(

RAR Password =  hacklabs

`Author: aseng#2055`
Forensic.name: Where is my Password

Forensic.description:
Tim Incident Response & Forensics dari perusahaan PETIR baru saja mendapatkan kasus terbaru dari salah satu perusahaan digital abal-abal berkedok Cybersecurity bernama SecNet, yang terbukti melakukan scam kepada masyarakat awam dan karyawan bawahannya.

Salah satu karyawan yang BARU SAJA dilantik menjadi karyawan senior SecNet, Noordin, berhasil ditangkap oleh tim PETIR dan diinterogasi. Ia dipercaya menjadi tangan kanan barunya PIC *Database Administrator* di SecNet. Tim PETIR juga berhasil mengakuisisi sejumlah memori berisikan berkas penting dari laptop Noordin.

Dapatkah kalian membantu Tim PETIR untuk **MENDAPATKAN SEJUMLAH PASSWORD** apapun yang  berkaitan dengan Noordin, baik akun Login Karyawannya, akun Googlenya ataupun akun Githubnya?

Diketahui bahwa Username Noordin bernama **Lebah_g4nteng**.

Flag terdiri dari **3 bagian** (semuanya akan didapatkan ketika kalian berhasil mengekstrak semua password yang berkaitan dengan Noordin).

Flag prefixnya berbeda dengan `hacklabs`. Namun jika diganti dengan `hacklabs` juga tidak masalah, keduanya valid.

Download soalnya [disini](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h0LMAt6hY9WO34kEqBqQtKRCncnaHthg/view?usp=sharing)

Author: aseng#2055
Forensic.name: DFIR Case 1  Sindikat Abal - Abal

Forensic.description:
I think my laptop has been hacked. Because I know you are an expert in analyzing memory, here I give you the memory dump. Find out what's bothering my laptop, there might be something malicious running which I...don't really know. ``Report back to me as soon as you can about the hacker's IP Address and Port.`` Thanks :D Flag Format : ``HACKLABS{IP-Address_Port}`` Link :
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eEwy2qmYajhgwrH84sVAycAJrbSKL6rr/view?usp=sharing
Forensic.name: Software

Forensic.description:
Awww, ada Octocat! Namun tenang, kunci rumahnya sudah diamankan!

Chall: https://mega.nz/file/LrJCzR7I#_MqDZftIcjIYvdxHbGoj__IgBGrt67mzVh6pGN8g498

Wrap the flag with: **hacklabs{*}**.

`Author: ErikHen#6413`
Forensic.name: digiGIT Octocat

Forensic.description:
Bobby akhirnya diketahui telah melakukan tindakan aksi yang sangat meresahkan sehingga membuat ia harus ditahan dulu oleh polisi karena bukti Anda. Dia terdakwa telah menjual senjata dengan bukti yang didapatkan di aplikasi note-taking lainnya meskipun notestersebut telah DIHAPUS. Dapatkah Anda menyebutkan 2 senjata tajam yang ia jual sebagai *supplier*?

Format Jawaban: namasenjata1_namasenjata2 (huruf kecil semua)

Contoh: ranjaudarat_pisaubelati

Maka flagnya -> `hacklabs{ranjaudarat_pisaubelati}`
Forensic.name: Android 1  Selundup (4)

Forensic.description:
Soal dengan prefix  Android 1 akan menggunakan file berikut dan memiliki deskripsi kasus awal seperti di bawah ini:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DmOtG5jNsRNtbFek1KwQBu19MX3_P_ZN/view?usp=sharing

Password = NCW22_sama_hology5_finalnya_tabrakan_gan:(

Bobby, merupakan seorang anak SMA yang sangat nakal. Ia pernah masuk ke dalam penjara remaja sejak SMP karena kelakuannya yang suka menjahili temannya hingga berlebihan. Kini, Bobby berulah lagi hingga membuat banyak temannya merasa kesal dengannya hingga dipanggil polisi daerah. Bobby gemar menutupi jejak aksinya dan sangat terencana, oleh karena itu polisi daerah diberikan penugasan untuk mengecek HP Bobby jika ada keanehan atau kekeliruan di dalamnya. Anda, sebagai tim Digital Forensik yang dapat diandalkan diminta untuk melakukan analisa dari hasil akuisisi sebuah **Android Image Phone**. 

Pertanyaan:

Kapan terakhir kali Bobby hendak mengunduh sebuah Game yang berkaitan dengan pembullyan di luar PlayStore?

Format Jawaban: DD/MM/YYYY_HH:MM:SS WIB

Contoh: 13/08/2021_14:02:30 WIB

Maka flagnya:

`hacklabs{13/08/2021_14:02:30 WIB}`
Forensic.name: Android 1  Ketahuan Nakal (1)

Forensic.description:
Bobby memiliki aplikasi notes-taking yang berisi beberapa rencana jahatnya untuk menjahili teman-temannya. Berapa notes yang telah dia hapus untuk menutupi jejaknya? Dan apa nama judul notes yang berisikan list-list rencananya?

Format Jawaban: jumlahnotes_judulnotes (jika ada karakter spesial atau spasi atau simbol lainnya, tetap cantumkan)

Contoh: 12_Rencana Eksekusi 2015 Man's Boom

Maka flagnya:

`hacklabs{12_Rencana Eksekusi 2015 Man's Boom}`
Forensic.name: Android 1  Licik (2)

Forensic.description:
Berapa kali Bobby mengunjungi website Kompas?

Format Jawaban: jumlahkunjungan

Contoh: 6

Maka, flagnya -> `hacklabs{6}`

Notes: Hati-hati, challenge ini memiliki 5x kesempatan untuk menjawab saja. Pergunakan ilmu forensik Anda dengan maksimal!
Forensic.name: Android 1  Meraba Desus (3)

Forensic.description:
Ada tambahan informasi dari sumber yang sama sebelumnya. Berapa anggota (termasuk Bobby) yang telah mendaftarkan diri ke BreachForums? Siapakah nama anggota terakhir?

Format Jawaban: jumlahanggota_namaanggotahurufkecilsemua

Contoh: 5_sultanprayoga

Maka flagnya -> `hacklabs{5_sultanprayoga}`
Forensic.name: Android 1  Forum Hacker (5)

Reverse Engineering.name: zeus or zoos

Reverse Engineering.description:
Have you ever heard of SECCOMP in pwn? Welp, I got a funny story for you because there's a DECCOMP in reverse engineering ( just my made up names tho :)) ). SECCOMP means to limit the syscall usage, but DECCOMP limits you from decompiling a binary :)). Can you still find a correct binary input?

Wrap the correct input with `hacklabs{.*}`

Download the file [here](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1_YxntVZq8sWI-QvB0nDM03fodUcaJaIH?usp=sharing)

Author: aseng#2055
Reverse Engineering.name: Deccomp

Reverse Engineering.description:
You've already known PHP before. But have you done reading PHP lang in low-level style?
I forgot my output from my original PHP and the source code lost in paradise :(, perhaps instead you can
recover it from this file?

Wrap the correct output with `hacklabs{.*}`.

Author: aseng#2055
Reverse Engineering.name: Low Level PHP

Reverse Engineering.description:
Mr. HoneyBee just trapped Mr. Dummy at his house and you really want to help him. Fortunately, you heard that Mr. HoneyBee had made a secret shortcut to let Dummy **walk through the wall** to escape. Could you find the secret shortcut and search for the flag around his house? Maybe you can find it in codes?

Chall: https://mega.nz/file/q2oWSI5Y#TJnkChNl853Io-E_sEJZIHRuyU_V1h3hzdcX--JXHKU

Wrap the flag with: hacklabs{*}

author: kisanak#5303
Reverse Engineering.name: Call of the Void

Reverse Engineering.description:
You have played **Gameboy**, but have you ever hacked one? It seems you will get a secret message once you've done the objectives in this lame game :((

Flag prefix is both accepted either `hacklabs` or the one that you'll get in the secret message!

Author: aseng#2055
Reverse Engineering.name: 80's

Web Exploitation.description:
Last week was a mess. My website got hacked, and the hacker managed to get all of my user information. Worst of all, the hacker managed to get my precious flag. I'm super pissed about it. But today, it will be different. I fixed the feature, and I'm sure that it's secure. Yeah.. I'm really sure about it. I also hired a developer to add new features to the website. One of them is to vote for your favorites author! I'm excited to show it to you. My developer said it wasn't finished yet, but I don't really care! I trust that guy. Oh, I also added a thank you page this time btw. All right, don't forget to vote for your favorite author!

Author: Shatternox#1668
Web Exploitation.name: The Quotes 2

Web Exploitation.description:
I just created my first website to view quotes from my favorite person in the world! Visit my website to read it!

Author: Shatternox#1668
Web Exploitation.name: The Quotes

Web Exploitation.description:
No more iDoor stuff, I fixed it! Even better, you can now add your own door!

Author: Shatternox#1668
Web Exploitation.name: iDoor Revenge

Web Exploitation.description:
Come and visit my website! The first person to buy a door will get a flag! Whoops too late! The admin already bought the flag on 1st April 2022. I guess you will never receive the flag.

Author: Shatternox#1668
Web Exploitation.name: iDoor
